bug.short_desc: [compiler][resource] Resource leak warning missing when extending parameterized class

long_desc.thetext:
Thanks for re-testing.
Still, let's leave the version at the earliest where this was observed. As long as the bug is unresolved it goes without saying that later versions are affected, too :) OTOH, a version of 4.4.1 would indicate a regression in a service release, which would be a severe problem.
Gerrit change https://git.eclipse.org/r/45252 was merged to [master]. Commit: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=60105dfcc44d74dc319b1919727afc1b3907fff9

(In reply to Eclipse Genie from comment #5) > Gerrit change https://git.eclipse.org/r/45252 was merged to [master]. > Commit: > http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/ > ?id=60105dfcc44d74dc319b1919727afc1b3907fff9
Given the analysis in comment 0 this could be quickly identified as a simple omission, trivially fixed by the above commit.
Sorry it took so long ...
Verified for Eclipse 4.5 Mars M7 Build id: I20150422-1000
